website_summaries.verdict: It is always a refreshing twist to trade canvas for an all-leather upper. It not only changes the aesthetics of the shoe, but it also makes it durable and easy to maintain. Much like the design of the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Core Leather Hi, these sneakers are guaranteed to be versatile and timeless. With the signature elements of the retro version retained, it didn't shy away from the sneaker that we know is a classic.
pros: Most of the commenters prefer the leather version of the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star Core Hi because it is much easier to maintain and clean
Although a bit more expensive than the canvas version, several users feel that it is worth it as they last longer
Numerous buyers prefer the stitched All-Star patch on this model as opposed to the printed logo on the classic Chucks
According to many testers, these sneakers are versatile and can match different outfits and occasions- casual or formal
Several claims that these instantly became their favorite pair
Fans of the Chuck Taylor All Star Core Leather Hi keep on ordering replacement pairs as a reserve
A high number of reviewers rave about the leather material as it is of good quality, genuine, and breaks in well
A couple of users love the protection provided by the leather upper
cons: Feedback among users of the Chuck Taylor All Star Core Leather Hi includes the sidewalls coming off and separating from the upper after a period of usage
For people needing arch support, these sneakers are not recommended by several commenters
Some of the owners are bothered that the tongue slips to the side

customer_reviews.title: These are the real deal and the price was really good since you normally get these at around 60-70 pounds ...
customer_reviews.text: I am a converse fan and I wanted some black leather converse. These are the real deal and the price was really good since you normally get these at around 60-70 pounds in a shop. I got the size 5.5 and they fit perfect. Really comfortable and classy.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great fit as repeat purchasing indicates.
customer_reviews.text: These are for someone else (they refunded me!) but they are very pleased with them and this is their second pair; they are such a fan and the fit is fine, even for his big feet! (He is 6ft 3ins tall, so in proportion).
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Heyward-Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding and comfy. A true icon and legendary fit. Look smart with jeans, especially leather style. Will certainly buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Converse All Star for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Have looked everywhere for the white and black in the size needed; however, there is some confusion on this page regarding the two different shoes. I ordered the white and black (Black) in a size not showing available for the all black one (Mono Black 001), but received the Mono Black 001. Have brought this to Amazon's attention and a replacement is in the works. Will update with what is received. All in all, looks to be the same narrow shoe I remember from youth. My son will definitely need the half size larger than usual, per the mfg. website.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveller

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - POOR QUALITY FOR A HUGE AMOUNT IF MONEY!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed! Paid 70 pounds ..... and this is what you get !!!! Not acceptable at all ! Don’t even bother .... Why would you spend 70 pounds on a pair of shoes and you can see the glue all the way around the souls of the shoes!! I would like a refund you can have the shoes back and I’ll take my money elsewhere !
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant ankle boots!
customer_reviews.text: Delighted with this pair of Converse ankle boots. They look great and are super comfortable and fit perfectly. Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K. Chevalier-watts

customer_reviews.title: It's a Converse...
customer_reviews.text: + Beautiful pair in rich leather. + Fits true-to-size + Comfortable - Might need a separate insole if you have an arch. Authentic pair, nice thick, rich leather. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Koko E.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love em!! Always had all stars since a kid of the 70’s but these in leather game changers 10/10
customer_reviews.author: paul glover

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Worn once & rubber curtain around sole of the boot is already coming away ! Would suggest that they're not fit for purpose. Dreadful lack of quality.
customer_reviews.author: K B

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The build quality is top-notch and they are way more comfy and waterproof than canvases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best shoes and perfect fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: the only shows I will ever wear even in the winter!!! perfect fit size 7!!
customer_reviews.author: luffychann

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: For 7 years now I always have to have a chucks, otherwise I don t feel well:)) anyway I chose this type at this time and I didn t regret it, the first challenge was a Madrid sightseeing through days, and it s past amazingly, good stuff, though avoid the puddles:)
customer_reviews.author: Trigger happy

customer_reviews.title: Love them ❤️
customer_reviews.text: They were just what i wanted, and a perfect fit and now my daughter wants a pair 😊
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Best trainers on the market!
customer_reviews.text: I love these trainers, they are extremely comfortable and last well, I've had some slightly cheaper brands of boot over the years but none last as long or provide as much comfort as Converse All Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldecca

customer_reviews.title: 100% as described
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Exactly as described new and unworn. The description provided is exactly what was delivered in the box. very happy with every aspect.
customer_reviews.author: Powesda

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: Leather, so is both warm and comfy! Excellent for office-wear.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gill

customer_reviews.title: Well priced Converse
customer_reviews.text: Well priced and much more robust than the canvass ones. Bought as school shoes and a big hit with teenage daughters.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Flashman

customer_reviews.title: Converse
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic quality, just as you would expect fit great price and delivery was on time would definitely buy again !
customer_reviews.author: S. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great service, perfect with no defects. Great fit, better on than in pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these and thinks they are brilliant and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for a fairly non standard size as my 4.5!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MJ would have loved these.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful little Converse shoes, 100% Authentic and fits like a glove. I mean you can't go wrong with a pair of Leather converses, you just can't. Get yourself one of these bad boys and Moonwalk your problems away

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable converse
customer_reviews.text: As expected trainers are great and very comfortable just as you expect converse trainers to be - thank you xx
